  • java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getAuthMethod

        @GET
@Path("AuthMethod/{identifier : [^/]*}")
public AuthMethod getAuthMethod​(@PathParam("identifier")
                                String identifier)
        Get the authentication method and its parameters a user shall use to authenticate with the given email address.
        Parameters:
        identifier - email address or username the user want to sign in with
        Returns:
        Auth method to user

      • getAllUsers

        @GET
public List<User> getAllUsers()
        Get all users
        Returns:
        list of all users

      • getUserById

        @GET
@Path("{id : [0-9]*}")
public User getUserById​(@PathParam("id")
                        Long id)
        Return the current authenticated user.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the user
        Returns:
        user which match the given id or null

      • getCurrentUser

        @GET
@Path("CurrentUser")
public User getCurrentUser()
        Return the current authenticated user.
        Returns:
        current user or null

      • getCurrentAccount

        @GET
@Path("CurrentAccount")
public Account getCurrentAccount()
        Return the current authenticated account.
        Returns:
        current account or null

      • getAllCurrentUserAccounts

        @GET
@Path("AllCurrentUserAccount")
public List<Account> getAllCurrentUserAccounts()
        Get all accounts owned by the current user
        Returns:
        list of accounts

      • signUp

        @POST
@Path("SignUp")
public void signUp​(SignUpInfo signup)
        Create a new local account.
        Parameters:
        signup - all data required to create a local account
        Throws:
        HttpErrorMessage - if creation fails for any reason

      • signIn

@Path("SignIn")
public void signIn​(AuthInfo authInfo)
        Authenticate with local-account credentials.
        Parameters:
        authInfo - credentials
        Throws:
        HttpErrorMessage - if authentication fails for any reason

@Path("SignOut")
public void signOut()

public void updateUser​(User user)
                throws ColabMergeException
        Update user names.
        Parameters:
        user - user to update
        Throws:
        ColabMergeException - if update fails

      • grantAdminRight

        @PUT
@Path("{id : [1-9][0-9]*}/GrantAdminRight")
public void grantAdminRight​(@PathParam("id")
                            Long id)
        Grant admin right to user identified by given id.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the user

      • revokeAdminRight

        @DELETE
@Path("{id : [1-9][0-9]*}/GrantAdminRight")
public void revokeAdminRight​(@PathParam("id")
                             Long id)
        remove admin right to user identified by given id.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the user

      • updateLocalAccountPassword

        @PUT
@Path("/UpdatePassword")
public void updateLocalAccountPassword​(AuthInfo authInfo)
        Update password of a localAccount. The password MUST be hasehd a first time by the client.

        Parameters:
        authInfo - identifier and new password
        Throws:
        HttpErrorMessage - if currentUser is not allowed to update the given account

      • requestPasswordReset

        @PUT
@Path("/RequestPasswordReset/{email}")
public void requestPasswordReset​(@PathParam("email")
                                 String email)
        Request a local account password reset. This method always returns 204 no content

        Parameters:
        email - email address of account

      • updateLocalAccountEmailAddress

        @PUT
@Path("/ChangeEmail")
public void updateLocalAccountEmailAddress​(LocalAccount account)
                                    throws ColabMergeException
        Update local account
        Parameters:
        account - local account with new email address inside
        Throws:
        ColabMergeException - if update fails

      • switchClientHashMethod

@Path("{id : [1-9][0-9]*}/SwitchClientHashMethod")
public void switchClientHashMethod​(@PathParam("id")
                                   Long id)
        ask the user to switch to new hash method on next sign-in.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the local account
